boardgame.name: Harry Potter: Honeydukes
boardgame.description:
During a school trip to Hogsmeade, you and your wizard friends decide to pay a visit to Honeydukes. After indulging in various treats, the group decides to turn this into a competition – whoever manages to eat the most condies is declared the winner. However, since this is no muggle’s deal, you’ll all need to follow some rules!

The game is set in rounds during which each player gets their turn. During their turn, each player must perform one of the following:

1. Buy candy (reveal the top two cards from the deck and take both or either of them and add to your player area. If you choose a single candy card, add the other one to the Reserve Area. If there are already cards in the Reserve Area at this point, you must also take from the reserve any candy cards that match the ones you have drawn from the center of the table and add to your player area.)

2. Eat candy (take the corresponding candy cards from your player area and stack them face down to do that. They are now your Eaten Candy and cannot be taken by another player)

You can only take one candy card available in the center of the table if you still don’t have a card of the same type in your Player Area. If you already have both of the candy cards available, that means you are a Sweet Tooth! And now you have to discard all the candy cards in your Player Area that haven’t been eaten yet.

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Mediterráneo
boardgame.description:
Before preparing for the dive you receive some objectives to locate the areas of some animals and others to avoid. Who will be able to complete it first?

Abstract board game of 18 cards for two players where we will carry out an underwater expedition through the Mediterranean. Players must form a common sea of ​​cards in which different sea creatures will appear or hide, scoring for each one in a different way.

The game is played to the best of three rounds and the first player to reach ten points will be the winner of each of them.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Antes de prepararos para la inmersión recibís unos objetivos para localizar las zonas de algunos animales y otras a evitar ¿Quién será capaz de completarlo antes?

Juego de mesa abstracto de 18 cartas para dos jugadores donde realizaremos una expedición subacuática por el Mediterráneo. Los jugadores deberán formar un mar común de cartas en el que irán apareciendo u ocultandose distintas criaturas marinas puntuando para cada uno de distinta manera.

El juego se juega al mejor de tres rondas y el primer jugador en alcanzar diez puntos será el vencedor de cada una de ellas.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Organizations: Board Games Association of Creators in Spain (LUDO)

boardgame.name: Sigils in the Dark
boardgame.description:
Publisher blurb:

You have a need, a deep burning need that drives you. Is it love, regret, desire?

The darkness whispers, “I can help you…”

Minutes turn to hours as you try to focus on the voice. Symbols, shapes, swirl in the darkness at the edge of your perception. If only you could grasp them, your needs would be met and more.

What is Sigils in the Dark?

Sigils in the Dark is a journaling game and GM supplement. The goal of the game is to create an evil mage’s spellbook. You’ll take up the role of this wizard with a desperate need, in search of arcane power to get what they want. They will try to understand dark sigils just outside their perception by randomly generating spells and adding liner notes to their grimoire. In the end, you’ll have an in-game artifact that you can pass on to players and hopefully know a little more about what your evil mage has sacrificed to get where they are.

boardgame.name: Classic Monsters
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Something is out there in the night...

...and that something is you. This book contains rules for playing classic monsters in a modern gothic-punk horror setting, using the most popular roleplaying system in the world. Rules for Vampire, Werewolf, Ghost, and Golem (a-la Frankenstein's Monster) are included, with rules for additional classes such as Faerie and Sea Monster coming soon in separate supplements.

Include Skills, Backgrounds, Tools, Weapons, etc. for use in a modernized setting. Also includes a free copy of Merits and Flaws!

boardgame.name: Sea Monster
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

In ocean depths, murky swamps, and shaded black lagoons, where even the most daring explorers fear to swim, terrifying creatures lurk in the deep. Though called Sea Monsters, they can be found in all bodies of water deep enough or murky enough enough to hide in. When they leave their watery homes, however, they take on a shape indistinguishable from a human, allowing them to hide among the human populace.

boardgame.name: Mummy
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

You are an Ancient Egyptian, who has been blessed by the god Horus with immortality. Though you can be killed, this only sends you into a cycle of death and resurrection. You have been serving your gods in this cycle, oscillating between the land of the living and the land of the dead, for hundreds of years. You have recently spent a long stretch in the land of the dead, but it is time to return to your body once more, and serve your ancient gods in the modern world.

boardgame.name: Witch
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

As a Witch, you have come to the startling realization that reality is malleable to the power of your belief. With your Faith, you can hack the rules of time and space to work wondrous magics upon the modern world. Be careful though; reality doesn't like being hacked into, and if you get caught, the system may bite you back!

Also contains rules for Hedge Mages, who follow well worn paths carved by Witches of old to perform Basic Magic that the weave of reality allows without the chance to Glitch.

boardgame.name: Alien
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Your people came to Earth with an important mission. Sadly, nobody remembers what that mission was. Your minds and memories and mission data were all stored in the central computer while your bodies were kept in cryosleep for the journey, and the computer suffered a fatal error that corrupted all relevant mission data, including the minds and memories of the colonists. You have innate psychic powers including the ability to disguise yourself, and the ship came equipped with high tech equipment and plasma weaponry, and with only this to go on you and your people must decide what to do next. Will you study human biology, learning how their bodies work and how best to cripple or cure them? Will you study human society and psychology, and learn how best to manipulate them and hide among them? Or will you simply try to kill them all? The choice is yours.

boardgame.name: Faerie
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Faeries are humans who were born with a Fey spirit in place of a human soul. They are creatures of the Feywild, a realm of chaos and boundless potential, both for creative good and for destructive nightmare. Faeries all have innate magic that can affect the minds of those in the Material Plane, or cause many other wonders in the Feywild.

boardgame.name: Hunter
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Hunters are humans who have come to the horrifying realization that Monsters are real, and have been granted superpowers to help fight back against them. "Hunt the Dead", "Take Back the Night", these and other such messages bombard the Hunter until they respond with violence.

boardgame.name: El Legado Robado - Parte II
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Segunda Aventura de nivel 4 de la saga "El Legado Robado" para el Escenario de Campaña "Las Tierras Yegimales".

From the back of the book:

Ningún humano del pueblo costero de Freeport pensaría jamás que la ciudad donde vive se encuentra al borde del colapso donde las fuerzas del mal siembran semillas de malicia y rencor. Los habitantes de Freeport empiezan a perder la fe en su Rey y en los dioses

User summary:

The PDF scenario is distributed with multiple image and map files (JPG format).

boardgame.name: El Legado Robado - Parte III
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Tercera Aventura de nivel 5 de la saga "El Legado Robado" para el Escenario de Campaña "Las Tierras Yegimales".

From the back of the book:

Ningún Sabio de Kárgudin pensaría jamás que la isla donde vive uno de los dragones más legendarios de todo el Reino de Tyrton es el lugar donde se fraguan malvados planes contra el reino de Tyrton. Son muchos y extraños los habitantes que pueblan la Isla Bor.

User summary:

The PDF scenario is distributed with multiple image and map files (JPG format).

boardgame.name: Misterios en Ciénega Negra
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Esta aventura es diseñada para 3- 6 jugadores de niveles 1 – 3, en la cual necesitarás el manual de jugador, manual de Dungeon Máster y el manual de monstruos, esta misma se puede ambientar en cualquier escenario de campaña, en mi caso lo he realizado para un mundo que estoy creando, pero se encuentra altamente influenciado por la campaña de Greyhawk.

boardgame.name: Rescate en Rugido-Quebrantado
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

EL MUNDO NUNCA ha sido un lugar seguro. Los bastiones de la civilización pueblan un oscuro, amenazante mundo - islas de orden y razón existen en una tierra por otra parte invadida por cultos oscuros, monstruos perversos, criaturas procedentes de los confines oscuros de la imaginación, y cosas peores. Tan mortal como el mundo es un día cualquiera, algo ha comenzado a moverse por los bordes del civilizado Valle de Elsir. Antiguamente el valle fue el lugar de un ataque de un ejército conocido como La Mano Roja, el Valle ha conocido varios años de paz desde que valientes aventureros se metieran en la boca de la invasorea Mano y fuera enviada a toda prisa de vuelta a la oscuridad.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Rescue At Rivenroar.

boardgame.name: Asedio a Vigilia de Bordrin
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

¿Cómo podemos olvidar el sufrimiento de los nuestros durante la Edad de las Cadenas? ¿Cómo podemos dejar a un lado aquellos antiguos rencores cuándo el riesgo de la esclavitud es mayor ahora que nunca?

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Siege of Bordrin's Watch. It is distributed with additional maps and images (JPG).

boardgame.name: La Brecha Sombria de Forja Umbral
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Somos mercenarios, todos nosotros, pero solo unos pocos poseen la honestidad suficiente para admitirlo.

Ya nos vendamos por dinero, por honor o por ideales, todos tenemos un precio cuyo pago continuo nos lleva inevitablemente a nuestro fin. Pero cuando ese fin llega, ¿vas a admitir tu hoja de servicios?

¿O vas a mentir cuando afirmes que la sangre en tus manos fue derramada solo por la causa, no simplemente por el hambre de gloria?

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of The Shadow Rift of the Umbraforge.
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: The Shadow Rift of the Umbraforge

boardgame.name: Marvel Zombies: A Zombicide Game – Guardians of the Galaxy Set
boardgame.description:
The Guardians of the Galaxy Set is an expansion for Marvel Zombies that adds a roster of space-dwelling characters to the game, including the ragtag members of the Guardians of the Galaxy. This band of living and zombie heroes must all contend with the momentous threat of zombie Thanos, as he wields the Infinity Stones to fulfill his mad plan!

Thanos acts as a special Enemy spawn that can be added to any mission, whether it be in Zombie Mode or Hero Mode. Every time Thanos activates, he will tap into the power of one of the stones (represented by a special Action deck). This will grant him additional game-altering effects during that Activation.

–description from the publisher

listing.notes: *** PREORDER WITH EXPECTED DELIVERY Q2 2023*** Contents: Kickstarter Exclusive Marvel Zombies Guardians of the Galaxy Board Game Expansion by CMON. Includes 11 Character pieces, 8 Super hero cards, 8 Zombie Hero cards, 4 Bystander cards, 6 Thanos Action cards, and 2 Thanos Spawn cards. Not a complete game. Requires Marvel Zombies to play (sold separately). Please note: unless otherwise stated paid add ons from the Kickstarter Campaign are not included.

boardgame.name: Las Minas Perdidas de Karak
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Las minas perdidas de Karak es una aventura para cinco personajes de nivel 6. Los personajes deberán estar hacia la mitad de nivel cuando la aventura acabe. Esta aventura es la continuación de “La brecha sombría de Forjaumbral” y la cuarta parte de la senda aventura Scales of War, sin embargo, con una pequeña modificación, puede ser jugada como una aventura autónoma o integrada en cualquier campaña de desierto existente en un área donde el reino enano podría haber estado situado.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of The Lost Mine of Karak.

boardgame.name: Kobolds
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Una aventura para 6 personajes pregenerados (nivel 1-2).

Esta es una aventura independiente para D&D 4ª edición. Es un poco especial porque sus protagonistas son un grupo de kobolds… sí, has leído bien, los PJs son kobolds en una misión sagrada de la que depende la continuidad del resto de su comunidad. Los personajes están pregenerados y se encuentran al final del documento.

Es ideal para jugar en unas jornadas o similar, aunque su duración puede ser algo larga a tal fin. Además incluye reglas especiales para el reparto de experiencia y la muerte de PJs que se incluyen en el apartado Reglas especiales.

boardgame.name: Las Lágrimas de los Dioses
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Cuenta la leyenda, que antes de la Era de los Trastornos el poder de Selûne menguó hasta tal punto, que necesitó refugiarse bajo la protección de Sune para evitar que su malvada y oscura hermana Shar pudiese hacerle daño. Durante un tiempo la Doncella luna fue una humilde servidora de Sune Cabello de fuego, pero además de eso, también fueron grandes compañeras, forjando una amistad que ha durado hasta nuestros días. Poco a poco, la fiel y leal Selûne fue recobrado su poder, hasta que llegó el momento de volver a establecerse por su cuenta.

Rezan los clérigos de ambas partes que, la noche en la que se separaron, ambas permanecieron abrazadas largo tiempo y en silencio. Mientras sentían el grandioso afecto que se profesaban, cada diosa derramó una lágrima de emoción y tristeza que al separarse, cayeron en el plano de Aguaclara. Mientras que algunos dicen que el firmamento es el dueño de esas lágrimas, otros aseguran que los servidores de las dos iglesias se encargaron de recogerlas al llegar a Toril en forma de gemas.

Pasaron los años y ya casi nadie recuerda la ubicación de las gemas o la manera de llegar a ellas, sólo los altos cargos de ambos cleros conocen el verdadero secreto y esta, es la historia de unos aventureros que intentaron desvelarlo.?"

Esta partida ha sido creada para cuatro jugadores, todos ellos con el perfil de aventureros y para el grado heroico, concretamente el nivel 8.

La trama se desarrolla en Luruar (Reinos Olvidados), entre las ciudades de Everlund y Luna Plateada, las cuales serán el escenario principal que albergará la historia.

boardgame.name: Una Presa para Bob Sonriente
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

“Una Presa para Bob Sonriente” es una aventura de DUNGEONS & DRAGONS para personajes de 1º nivel. La historia tiene lugar en Bosque de Harken, una baronía en el Valle del Nentir (consulta el Kit de Dungeon Master para más información). Sin embargo, la aventura puede ser situada en cualquier zona de un mundo de campaña, donde haya medianos, goblins y osos.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Prey for Smiley Bob.

boardgame.name: Torre Tormentosa
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Torre Tormentosa es una aventura DUNGEONS & DRAGONS para cinco personajes de 3º nivel. Comienza en la villa de Cima del Salto, descrita en el Capítulo 11 de la Guía del Dungeon Master. Los personajes jugadores ha estado en Cima del Salto durante un tiempo breve, quizás disfrutando de cierto “tiempo de inactividad” entre aventuras, y justo lo suficiente para que rumores sobre su heroismo comiencen a circular entre los lugareños.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Storm Tower.

boardgame.name: Love, Career & Magic: A SHAREHOME Game
boardgame.description:
A reality TV card game set in a fantastical modern world with orcs, elves, and dragons. Play as a mythical creature living with 5 other strangers in the same house as part of a reality TV series! Form friendships, stir up drama, and achieve your secret life goals.

A party game of improv and acting where players pick from 25 different characters and act out various events. Pick players you want to date and correctly guess who likes/hates who for points. Achieve secret life goals to also earn points and graduate from the reality TV show.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: La Bóveda de Darom Madar
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Una aventura de Sol Oscuro para cinco personajes de 1º nivel que tiene lugar en las abrasadoras Altiplanicies de Athas y desafía a los personajes a encontrar un tesoro antiguo perdido en este inmenso desierto.

¡Sin embargo, los personajes no estan solos en esta búsqueda de una fortuna hace tiempo perdida!

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of The Vault of Darom Madar.

boardgame.name: Señor del Campo Blanco
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Y vi un paisaje accidentado de rocas marchitas y árida tierra agrietada. Lápidas destrozadas, tumbas antiguas y mausoleos en ruinas surgían de la tierra sin vida hasta donde alcanzaba la vista como parodias macabras de plantas corrientes. Las únicas estructuras visibles no estaban construidas de piedra, ladrillo o madera, sino de incontables huesos entretejidos y fusionados, soportados por otros, huesos del todo más monstruosos que tenían el propósito de arcos y vigas en la construcción mortal. En este lugar terrible sólo los muertos intranquilos se movían, malditos a una eternidad de hambre indecible por la carne de sus compañeros que nunca podía ser saciada. Encima de todo, como una cubierta extendida sobre el horror de debajo, se alzaba una nube ondulante de hueso pulverizado que borraba el sol ardiente y caía sobre aquellos por debajo como una nieve cadavérica. Este, entonces, es el reino conocido como el Reino Blanco, el feudo de Doresain, el Rey Gul, quien es exarca para Orcus.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Lord of the White Field.

boardgame.name: La Venganza de los Merodeadores
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

El señor de los incursores, Yarnath recorre los yermos en su ciudadela reptante el Reptil. No hace mucho, Yarnath dedicó todos sus esfuerzos para recuperar un fragmento de un artefacto conocido como la Corona del Polvo. Pero alguien se le adelantó.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Revenge of the Marauders.

boardgame.name: Way Too Many Cats!
boardgame.description:
Way Too Many Cats is a competitive drafting spatial puzzle game about drafting cats, making each cat happy, and pressing your luck in the number of kittens you take on.

Players are managers of an adoption agency trying to show off each cat in the best light. They accomplish this differently depending on the cat type and the individual characteristics of each cat.

The game is played until one player fills all showcase spots in their adoption center; all players get equal turns and the player with the cutest cats wins!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: La Torre Hundida del Mistico del Pantano
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

“Los medianos han estado pescando y cazando en el Gran Pantano durante generaciones sin problemas serios por parte de los habitantes o criaturas del pantano. Pero en los últimos tiempos, han desaparecido medianos mientras pescaban en el pantano. Los líderes del pueblo sospechan que la cercana tribu de hombres lagarto tiene algo que ver con esto, pero no poseen niguna prueba. Buscan algunos aventureros valientes que puedan encontrar y rescatar a los medianos desaparecidos e impedir cualquier otra desaparición.”

La Torre Hundida del Místico del Pantano” es una aventura para personajes de niveles 3 a 5.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of The Sunken Tower of the Marsh Mystic”.
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: The Sunken Tower of the Marsh Mystic”

boardgame.name: La Torre Fantasma de los Marjales de la Luz Bruja
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Fuiste en busca de la caja robada. Rastreaste a los goblin hasta su guarida y tuviste el valor de enfrentarte a ellos en combate. Tanto si tuviste éxito como si no, sabías que si continuabas solo no volverías con el premio que pretendías recuperar. Por ello te retiraste y recorriste el largo camino de vuelta a la civilización. Durante ese viaje, tomaste la determinación de buscar a otros aventureros fieles que aportaran acero frío y conjuros mortales a tu causa. Con toda seguridad encontrarás a los aliados que necesitas en Cima del salto. Pero nunca se sabe lo que uno se puede encontrar en el camino a casa.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Ghost Tower of the Witchlight Fens.

boardgame.name: El Tesoro del Paso de la Garra
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

En El Tesoro del Paso de la Garra, los personajes jugadores exploran una antigua guarnición de montaña en busca de un cáliz de jade que se cree que vale una pequeña fortuna. Pero el camino hacia el cáliz de jade no es fácil. Un dragón y sus esbirros kóbold han establecido su residencia en la guarnición, y también algunos soldados muertos vivientes de hace mucho tiempo aún frecuentan sus salas.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Treasure of Talon Pass.

boardgame.name: Armello - The Dragon Clan
boardgame.description: Join the insidious band of scaled heroes in their journey to reclaim their birthright, Armello's throne. The Dragon Clan, Armello's second Clan DLC, features four new playable Heroes, a brand new Dragon-exclusive Quest system, a complete Dragon Clan Novella, Dragon Dice, six new Signets, and a new Amulet!

boardgame.name: El Legado de Baelard
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Hace generaciones (o siglos, dependiendo del escenario), la Biblioteca de Bosquealto era un pequeño centro de aprendizaje dirigido por sacerdotes y sabios de Ioun. Ser invitado a estudiar o enseñar en esta lejana y aislada institución, era un honor de toda una vida, y ser enterrado en las catacumbas bajo la biblioteca era la recompensa para una vida dedicada al conocimiento.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Baelard's Legacy.

boardgame.name: El Invierno de la Bruja
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Un frío viento invernal sopla desde las Montañas Azote, pero sus orígenes no son de este mundo. Y con él llegan historias terribles de una hada que recorre la tierra. Fría, bella y mortal, convierte a cada mortal que toca en una estatua de hielo, y parece decidida a cubrir todo el norte en una capa de hielo.

Es el Invierno de la Bruja... y si la archifata Koliada no es detenida puede ser el último del mundo.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Winter of the Witch.

boardgame.name: El Agarrón de Thalarkis
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

“El Agarrón de Thalarkis” comienza en un pequeño pueblo pesquero a orillas de un gran mar. El grueso de la aventura tiene lugar bajo las olas, en los restos de un legendario barco aventurero y en un santuario impío construido por un grupo de kuo-toa.

Los kuo-toa buscan liberar el espíritu de un poderoso kraken que embruja los restos de un barco. Si los kuo-toa tienen éxito en sus planes, el kraken fantasma ya no estará atado al naufragio y podrá aterrorizar los mares otra vez en su nueva forma no muerta.

“El Agarrón de Thalarkis” es una aventura DUNGEONS & DRAGONS para personajes de niveles 13-15.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Grasp of Thalarkis.

boardgame.name: Ira Infernal
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

“Ira Infernal” es un misterioso asesinato envuelto dentro de un misterioso asesinato. La gente de Raske cree que un fantasma esta eligiendo como objetivos a ciudadanos que son miembros secretos de un grupo vigilante violento llamado los Ángeles Rojos. ¿Podrán los aventureros descubrir quien esta en el grupo a tiempo de impedir muertes posteriores? ¿Los Ángeles Rojos asesinos siquiera merecen ser protegidos?

Esta aventura de D&D esta diseñada para personajes de niveles 4 a 6. El pueblo de Raske y su gente pueden ser situados fácilmente en cualquier campaña.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Infernal Wrath.

boardgame.name: ¿Qué Pasa en la Sombra Inferior?
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

La Sombra Inferior es una inmensa caverna ubicada en el nivel superior de Bajomontaña. La zona atrae a los elementos indeseados de Aguasprofundas, así es que un escondrijos para ladrones y los oprimidos. A veces los habitantes de La Sombra Inferior desaparecen, pero una ola de desapariciones puede hacer que incluso la peor gente se sorprenda y preste atención.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of What's Up in Downshadow.

boardgame.name: Descenso a las Profundidades de la Tierra
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

El pasaje de las cavernas bajo los salones del Rey Snorri se abre al noroeste; de aspecto áspero y retorcido, de 12 a 16 pies de anchura durante unos 300 pies. De repente se ensancha a 30 pies o más en algunos lugares, obviamente, tallados, casi a la perfección hacia el noroeste, desciende lentamente en suaves laderas y en bancales naturales. La roca es de todos los colores, aunque gris, marrón, y amarillo bronce son los más comunes. Aunque algunas partes han sido cavadas, la mayor parte de los túneles son pasajes naturales, cuevas, galerías y así sucesivamente. La ruta siempre desciende. La oscuridad no es total; a veces hay colonias de líquenes fosforescentes, iluminando el camino con un débil resplandor (como de hadas). En ocasiones os cruzáis con un enjambre de escarabajos de fuego, y sus brillantes abdómenes arrojan suficiente la luz para ver con claridad. Murciélagos de las cavernas, criaturas enormes y horrendas que han abandonado el aire limpio del mundo superior por la viciada atmosfera de los subterráneos, revolotean por las alturas de la cueva periódicamente. De vez en cuando podéis sentir una corriente de aire frío y húmedo deslizándose hacia las profundidades, llevando un aroma húmedo por los pasillos de este triste inframundo

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of D1: Descent Into the Depths of the Earth.

boardgame.name: Bajo Illefarn
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Bajo Illefarn es un libro de campaña de AD&D para un Dungeon Master y de cuatro a ocho personajes de 1er nivel. También es posible comenzar como un personaje de nivel 0. Más tarde hablaremos de eso.

Comienzas como un personaje en la ciudad mercantil de Vado de la Daga. Según la ley de Vado de la Daga, sirves en la milicia. Como miembro de la milicia, tienes la oportunidad de participar en varias aventuras que deberían permitirte avanzar de nivel. Cuando la campaña acabe, tu personaje debería estar en el 3er o 4º nivel. Un personaje de clase múltiple puede llegar a nivel 2 para algunas o todas sus categorías.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of N5: Under Illefarn.

boardgame.name: El Santuario de los Kuo-Toa
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Antecedentes de la Aventura: Después de haber derrotado a los gigantes y descubrir que no eran más que títeres de los largo tiempo olvidados Elfos Oscuros (Drows). Los PJs sienten la determinación de llevar la guerra hasta los Drows, para ello, los valerosos aventureros organizan una expedición a los oscuros dominios de los Drows, con la finalidad de conocer la localización de los asentamientos Drows y el número de sus fuerzas. Una vez hecho esto, podrán vengarse de los odiados Drows. La Aventura comienza con Modulo D1: Descenso a las Profundidades de la Tierra.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of D2: Shrine of the Kuo-Toa, performed for Birthright1979, Febrero 2018.

boardgame.name: La Novía de la Muerte
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Cuando los heroes se disponían a dormir en una posada del pequeño pueblo de Lembest, un fuerte ruído los despierta, al parecer, los muertos se han llevado a la hija del posadero. El rastro les conducirá aun Templo en reuinas, y bajo el, las más oscuras pesadillas les aguardan, de vosotros depende devolver a la joven con vida a los brazos de su padre.

boardgame.name: Criaturas de la Marca
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Criaturas de la Marca es un suplemento no oficial para el juego de rol Aventuras en la Marca del Este. Entre sus páginas encontrarás descritos más de un centenar de enemigos con los que los Aventureros Jugadores pueden medirse, abarcando desde el pequeño ahogador hasta la colosal tarasca.
boardgame.rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este

boardgame.name: Fiendish Firearm Fabricator
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

In this sourcebook for old-school RPGs, you'll find rules for creating a random firearm, including type, range, damage, ammo type (incendiary, necrotic, etc.), and backstory. Roll on a series of random tables to generate the Cryonic Shotgun of Doom, the Septic Blunderbuss of the Abyss, or the Noxious Laser Rifle of Brutality.

boardgame.name: Space Time
boardgame.description:
In Space Time, you role play as a scavenger among the stars, flying your trusty rocket all around the universe, in an attempt to earn income, by completing tasks, finding items, and using tools at your disposal to gain an advantage.

However, watch out for "Space Pirates." They can take everything in your cargo hold, and set you back, big time."

Over the course of three rounds; players draft from a grid of 15 cards choosing to take a low, medium, or high risk card. Flipping the card over will reveal if you have gained an item with income (victory points), a tool which will give you a optional action, an event which will give you an instant effect, or an attack card which will cause you to loose items.

boardgame.name: Shadows Over Normandie: Conversion Deck
boardgame.description:
Convert your Heroes of Normandie and Heroes of Stalingrad decks into Shadows over Normandie decks and discover new facets of the Achtung! Cthulhu universe!

Content:

Heroes of Normandie – 6 US Cards 2.0
Heroes of Normandie – 6 GE Cards 2.0
Heroes of Normandie – 6 UK Cards 2.0
Heroes of Stalingrad – 6 RU Cards 2.0
Heroes of Stalingrad – 6 GE Cards 2.0

listing.notes: In original plastic.
Title: Shadows Over Normandie: Conversion Deck Publisher: Devil Pig Games Language(s): English

boardgame.name: Streetcar Suburb
boardgame.description:
Transform an unsustainable suburb into a diverse, affordable, and walkable town. Remove single-family housing limits to let the citizens build, then connect buildings with streetcar lines of your own color to score points.

What is uniquely awesome about this game?

Minimalist crayon rail game with 1-page rules on the scale of a town rather than a continent.
The town is procedurally generated in 3D as the game progresses.
Transform an unsustainable suburb into a diverse, affordable, and walkable town.


Streetcar Suburb has no luck or hidden information, and rewards strategic play. The randomized setup is neutral to both players, ensuring that every game is both unique and fair.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Supremacy 2021
boardgame.description: A revision of the Supremacy 2020 game, with streamlined rules and improved game board and pieces. The game takes the improvements made in Supremacy 2020 and takes the game a step further, with less cyclical turns, country resources kept on a track on the main map, adding optional rules for alliances, terrain and weather, and more.

boardgame.name: 百合乱慕 (Yuri Ranbou)
boardgame.description: Play as girls attempting to gain a harem. Draft cards of various levels of strength with unique effects to form your hand and battle other players, winning the affection of various girls to build your harem. Over three rounds, each player plays a card from their hand. After resolving all effects, the player with the highest strength gains the girl targeted that round. At the end of the third round, the player with the most girlfriends wins the game.

boardgame.name: UNO Ultimate
boardgame.description:
If you can't be a Superhero at least you can play UNO like one! Each player chooses the identity of a Marvel character who has powers you can use on EVERY TURN! After you choose your character, you play the game with a corresponding Character Deck.

In the UNO Ultimate card game you match colors, numbers, and symbols just like classic UNO. Each Character Deck has special power and Wild Cards designed just for that character. There's also a Danger Deck with "Event" cards and "Enemy" cards that can really change the game! Like any great superhero battle, there's gonna be a lot of powers and stuff lying around, so buckle-up and pay attention!

There are also two ways to win! Get rid of all your cards in your hand or be the last player standing with cards in their character deck.

Collectible foil cards in each box.

Don't forget to call Uno when down to 1 card!
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Uno Ultimate: Add-on Pack – Doctor Strange
Uno Ultimate: Add-on Pack – Scarlet Witch

boardgame.name: Tech Exchange
boardgame.description:
Tech Exchange is a multi-player, real-time trading card game for 2-6 Players. It uses a modern deck of cards called the Tech Deck. Each card in the Tech Deck represents stocks in companies that players trade. As players trade cards and use card abilities, the stock market gains value. Each stock card has card abilities that players can use during two turn-based effects rounds. Players score victory points based on the value of their final hand after all trading is completed. Players are trying to collect sets of triples, quadruples and a flush (cards that share a domain/suit).

REAL TIME TRADING – The players trade cards from their hands between each other in real-time. There are no turns and trading happens simultaneously between players following a few trading rules.

USE CARD EFFECTS – When a stock stack hits a value of three or no one wishes to trade anymore, trading pauses. Then, players take turns using effects on the cards in their hand. Trading continues. After all trading has completed, there is a second use effects round.

STOCK SCORING – After the second use card effects round, players tally up victory points based on the value of card groupings in their hand and the value of the stock market.

WINNER – After three rounds of play, the player with the most points is the winner. If tied, players share the victory.

TECH DECK AS A GAME SYSTEM - The Tech Deck is a modernized deck of cards bringing playing cards into the 21st century. It is a game platform designed to support many different games. Each card in the Tech Deck has unique game effects to create unique game experiences. Also, see Tech Grid Poker, Tech City which are other games that use the Tech Deck.

—description from the designer

boardgame.description:

boardgame.name: Border Watch
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Border Watch (Vigilancia fronteriza) es una aventura para 4-5 personajes de nivel 1 aparecida originalmente en 1993 de la mano de TSR para AD&D2 edición.

Está ambientada entre las fronteras del Reino de Furyondia y el Imperio de Iuz. Este fue un módulo siguiendo la estela de la Caja “From the ashes” (desde las cenizas) que relataba el fin de las guerras del Falcongris y constituía una actualización del escenario de campaña.

User summary:

A Spanish-language translation of WGM1: Border Watch, which apparently is unlicensed. The scenario is published as two separate PDF files:


33-page scenario
15-page Guía del Dungeon Master Borderwatch


A ZIP archive of thirteen supporting images (JPG) and maps also is provided.

boardgame.name: El Azote de la Costa de la Espada
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

El Azote de la Costa de la Espada es una aventura de D&D Next diseñada para personjaes de 2º nivel. Esta aventura es la primera parte de la campaña Sueños de los Magos Rojos campaign, la cual continúa con la aventura Muerto en Zhay, disponible más adelante en 2014. A lo largo de estas dos avenutras, los personajes se pueden enfrentar con villanos importantes del escenario de campaña de REINOS OLVIDADOS.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Sundering Adventure III: Dreams of the Red Wizards: Scourge of the Sword Coast.

boardgame.name: La Casa de la Muerte
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Puedes jugar La Maldición de Strahd para personajes de 1º nivel con la ayuda de esta aventura opcional, la cual ha sido diseñada para hacer avanzar a los personajes hasta el 3º nivel. Los jugadores que creen personajes de 1º nivel pueden usar el trasfondo de personaje de “Embrujado” en el Apéndice A o pueden escoger trasfondos del Manual del Jugador de la forma normal.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of DDIA-04: Death House.

boardgame.name: La Noche de los Muertos que Caminan
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Una aventura introductoria a RAVENLOFT™, el semiplano del terror, para personajes de nivel 1 a 3.
...
Tres ramas arañan el cristal de la ventana, las luces parpadean a medida que la tormenta se intensifica, y el viento gime como una banshee en la noche. La hora del terror está una vez más sobre nosotros, llamándonos de vuelta a las costas de Ravenloft para otra terrorífica aventura. ¿Están listos para entrar en el semiplano del terror?

boardgame.name: Un Caballero Oscuro y Atormentado
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Los personajes se refugian dentro de un tor durante una tormenta violenta. Mientras están acampando en la cámara exterior, la tormenta se abre una de las puertas interiores, lo que permite el acceso a las tumbas humanoides dentro del tor. Después de derrotar a los diversos monstruos que allí residen ahora —y a los grandes trasgos invasores que pretenden hacer del tor su nueva base— los PJs se encuentra con el mismísimo Caballero Oscuro, un hobgoblin zombie enterrado en la cámara más profunda del tor.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of A Dark and Stormy Knight.

boardgame.name: La Persecución de la Oveja
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

El intento de aprovechar una rara tarde de inactividad del grupo de aventureros se ve interrumpido por una frenética oveja equipada con un Pergamino de hablar a los animales y una determinación feroz para llamar su atención. Sin embargo, esta no es una mera bestia, es un hechicero víctima de un aprendiz amargado que posee un varita de transmutación verdadera (Wand of True Polymorph) Asesinos transformados están buscando un cordero para cenar, mientras que el único objeto capaz de reestablecer sus pulgares oponibles reposa en las manos de su formado pupilo y actual némesis. Afortunadamente, el lanudo mago ha encontrado nuevos aliados de los que puede depender, Verdad?

boardgame.name: Sombras Sobre el Mar de la Luna
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Los aventureros han respondido a la invitación a venir al Cementerio Valhingen y hablar con el Guía Mortuorio Yovir Glandon, un alto sacerdote de Kelemvor (el dios de la muerte legal neutral). Yovir ha oído rumores sobre un “buque fantasma” que ataca a las comunidades costeras y está preocupado con que finalmente venga a Phlan. Entre el odio a los muertos vivientes de su Orden y su preocupación cívica, Yovir está buscando a un grupo de aventureros capaces para que aborden este reto. El Orden del Sudario Silencioso es neutral en la política de la ciudad y por tanto ha decidido evitar toda la burocracia de la ciudad y actuar directamente antes que la amenaza se plante ante las puertas de la ciudad.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of DDEX1-03: Shadows over the Moonsea.

boardgame.name: Secretos de la Fortaleza Sokol
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

El Goblin Sonriente es una gran taberna vieja y oscura que ha tenido tiempos mejores. La carpintería está desgastada, el yeso antiguamente blanco ahora amarillea se desmorona, y los candelabros y linternas están oxidados. Los muebles muestran señales de uso intenso y las cicatrices de diferentes tanganas.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of DDEX1-02: Secrets of Sokol Keep.

boardgame.name: Asesinato en Puerta de Baldur
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Puerta de Baldur es una ciudad al borde de la guerra ,una olla hirviendo a fuego lento por las tensiones sociales en las que incluso el más pequeño disturbio podría hacer que se desbordase volviendo a la ciudad contra de sí misma. Los Muros dividen Puerta de Baldur en tres ciudades. Los ricos viven en lo alto de acantilados protegidos de la burguesía. Sus casas se aferran a las laderas, impidiendo literalmente que miembros de la clase media suban por encima de su posición. Más allá de la protección de las murallas, muchos parias de la ciudad viven sin ninguna ley, aparte de la impuesta por las dagas de los ladrones.

En este barril de pólvora, una vieja amenaza parpadea a una nueva vida. La trama de una deidad asesinada finalmente da sus frutos, resucitando al dios de los asesinos. Bhaal vivirá de nuevo. Y en la ciudad que una vez frustró su renacimiento, tres figuras prominentes, sin saberlo, compiten por anunciar su regreso.

A medida que los cuerpos obstruyen las calles, ¿podrán los héroes evitar que la ciudad se destruya a sí misma? ¿Pueden evitar que Bhaal reclame la mente y el alma de uno de los ciudadanos más poderosos de la ciudad? ¿O recaerá el favor de Bhaal sobre uno de ellos mientras luchan en su camino hacia el éxito?

Sólo una cosa es segura: correrá la sangre.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Sundering Adventure I: Murder in Baldur's Gate. This is published as four PDF files:

Prologo. Asesinato en Puerta de Baldur - Una expansión del inicio de la aventura.
Aventura. Asesinato en Puerta de Baldur - La aventura de Asesinato en Puerta de Baldur
AePdB suplemento de Eventos - Una expansión de posibles eventos en la aventura.
Guía del DM Asesinato en Puerta de Baldur - guia de localizaciones y personajes importantes

boardgame.name: El Legado de la Piedra de Cristal
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

El Invierno ha llegado al valle del Viento Helado. Las gentes de las Diez Ciudades están nerviosas: con comida y suministros escasos, cada villa se preocupa celosamente por su propia supervivencia. Más allá de los muros, los lobos y los yetis merodean por las tierras salvajes y los pocos viajeros suficientemente valientes como para aventurarse allí, raras veces retornan.

Al Norte, las tribus Reghed susurra historias de la Doncella de Escarcha, la cual se ha manifestado en el mundo para castigar a aquellos que han abandonado su adoración. Y en las laderas de la Cumbre de Kelvin, un viejo enemigo despierta para terminar la conquista que inició hace más de cien años.

El Legado de la Piedra de Cristal TM es una aventura para personajes de Nivel bajo que puede ser jugada como aventura separa o como una secuela a Asesinato en Puerta de Baldur.

Esta aventura permite a los jugadores explorar las vastas extensiones del helado norte de Faerûn y enfrentarse tanto a viejos enemigos como a nuevas amenazas para las gentes del Valle del Viento Helado.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Sundering Adventure II: Legacy of the Crystal Shard. This scenario is published as four PDF files:

Prologo
Aventura
Tablas y Encuentros
Guía del DM

boardgame.name: Campaña Fantasmas del Castillo Lanza de Dragon
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

En esta sección están las aventuras que componen la campaña Fantasmas del castillo de Lanza de Dragon (Ghosts of the Dragonspear Castle). Esta campaña lleva a los personajes desde nivel 1 hasta aproximadamente el nivel 10. La campaña se centra en un antiguo culto, relacionado con un antiguo mal, en el que se conjugan sectarios, tanto vivos como muertes, los Magos Rojos de Thay en los alrededores de Vado de la Daga.

User summary:

An apparently unauthorized, Spanish-language translation of Ghosts of Dragonspear Castle. This scenario is published as five PDF files:
1ª Parte – El Templo del Devorador del Sol
2ª Parte – Las Criptas malditas de Ambergul
3ª Parte – La Caída de Ilefarn
4ª Parte – Castillo Lanza de Dragón
5ª Parte – Extra- Guía del DM de Fantasmas del Castillo Lanza de Dragón

boardgame.name: Jungle Library Ruins
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A huge, abandoned library built from thick stone on the edge of a lake, overlooking its vast expanses. Behind it waits thick jungle, filled with all kinds of strange calls come nightfall. Wildflowers cling to windows and entryways, while a secret room with a glowing red book waits at its heart...

With this map and its detailed one-shot adventure, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: The Library of Secrets
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A huge library built from thick stone on the edge of a lake, overlooking its vast expanses. Behind it waits thick jungle, filled with all kinds of strange calls come nightfall. Wildflowers cling to windows and entryways, while a secret room with a glowing red book waits at its heart...

With this map and its detailed one-shot adventure, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: The Cult of the Cyclops
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The dwarven Goltier Silver Mine has been hijacked! After a significant archeological discovery was made by a team of miners and word spread of the dig, a sadistic group of cultists that worship under the name Cyclorni took to the mine. They ransacked, pillaged, murdered, and took over the operation of the mine. They have set up shop within the silver mine, and are not planning on leaving any time soon. The adventurers were voted into the task by the community of Frondmore, on the outskirts of which the mine is located.

boardgame.name: Guardians of Island Peace: The Moonshae-Fey Expeditions
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

An entire island to explore. Fantastical beasts to save. There's no time to lose.

Strange beasts have been spotted stalking the land. A mysterious Drow offers a high price for their safe return. Poachers, bandits and mercenaries are closing in. Can you rescue them before an untimely demise?

"Aye, thought you could keep this a secret from us, eh? Well, unlucky for you. We ain’t the fools you take us for. Get rid of you and this 'ere is all ours. We’ll take as many o’those pretty little beasties these hands can carry." - Rutgar Boneknuckle, pretty terrible guy and dastardly poacher.

In this adventure, you'll find an open, non-linear sandbox for players to explore. A narrative hook, main quest line and concluding showdown are supported by key locations, recurring characters and travel-based encounters that come together to tell a different and unique player-led story each time.

boardgame.name: Bugs
boardgame.description:
"Bugs" is a tactical-level wargame with six asymmetrical factions that models episodes in the lives of various insect species. In addition, this game system is designed to include new expansions, where factions of other phyla can be introduced, for example: reptiles.
The rules weight can vary, being suitable to a broad range of ages and war game knowledge, so it can be played by both children who are learning to count (4+) and more experienced wargamers.
In educational terms, this game aims to alert the community to the difficulties that animals face every day, and will increasingly face thanks to global warming. The game has a mechanic that simulates, by increasing the difficulty, possible future scenarios in which food is scarce, and weather conditions will be less favorable.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Les Gardiens de Havresac
boardgame.description:
The Kingdom of Havresac has been stricken with a terrible curse, and only your team of guardians can liberate it. Gather glory, gold and victory points to become the most bravest defender of the kingdom.

All members of your team of guardians are kept in your bag, each with their own special role and ability. On each round, successively draw your guardians from your bag and use them on your own kingdom board in order to rebuild villages, fight off monsters, free fairies in time, open treasure chests… Each guardian you play allows the next to go further out in the kingdom in order to reach the places you aim, if you plan adequately. Your heroic acts grant you points for the final victory, but also gold to recruit new guardians, building up your bag and refining your strategy.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Mini Rogue: Loup & Forge
Mini Rogue: Wolf & Forge Promo cards
boardgame.description:
These two promo cards for Mini Rogue(the wolf and the forge) were available during Essen 2021.

The Wolf is a loyal companion, this card will help you during combats

The Forge can be useful in order to win experience and to build armor.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Sleeping on Damned Reptile Gods
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

While travelling beside an open cave, you meet a band of eleven gnomes. The gnomes appear travel-weary and forlorn, huddled around a small fire near the cave entrance. The eleven gnomes mumble amongst themselves, talking of doom and other dire things. They had been exploring the cave, searching for their ancestors’ crystal keep, when they were come upon by monsters of the deep! Their leader, Bingo, was slain, and with him their crystal key was lost. The gnomes ask that you venture into the cave and retrieve for them the crystal key, for it is theirs by ancestral right, not to be sullied by the hands of cavern things.

Sleeping on Damned Reptile Gods is a one-page adventure by James Millichamp, created for the Random Adventure Jam. In it, you will aid a band of gnomes and descend into the deepest caverns of the earth, meeting trolls, clay-things, and reptile gods along the way!

boardgame.name: Les Jeux Olympiques
boardgame.description: The Olympic Games is a card game similar to belote. By winning tricks, you progress on different tracks which represent events (high jump, 100 meters, long jump, marathon...).

boardgame.name: Cubosaurs
CuboSaurus
boardgame.description:
Each type of dinosaurs you draft has its own scoring rules, earning or costing points depending on the number of these specific cards you gathered at the end of the round. To score higher than your opponents, you must decide each turn whether you want to play the hand of cards you were offered, or to pass it to the next player. But declining a hand has a real cost: you must be able to add a new card to it, taken from your dinosaurs herd – and this card has to be different from all other cards already in this hand. If you're smart, you can turn this to your advantage and get rid of the cards negatively impacting your collection. If you want a chance to win, you'll also have to avoid being left with no other choices than taking the worst hands…

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Pathfinder Flip-Tiles: Dungeon Crypts Expansion
boardgame.description:
24 double-sided 6" x 6" color map tiles showing dungeon crypts, burial chambers, and catacombs.

Wet, dry, and permanent marker erasable.

Expands the Dungeon starter set, and is compatible with the expansions Dungeon perils, Dungeon vaults, and Dungeon mazes.

boardgame.name: The Cursed One
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

People says that in a thousand years, The Cursed One had a thousand masters. He made pirates into emperors just to see them be murdered minutes after the coronation, commanding with every win he gave, a harsher cost to pay. Now anyone who knows his existence calls him a cursed god.

The Cursed One is a playset for Stealing the Throne.

boardgame.name: Pathfinder Flip-Tiles: Fortress Walls & Towers Expansion
boardgame.description:
24 double-sided 6" x 6" color map tiles showing defensive walls, stairs and rubble, tower rooftops, archer posts, fortress entrances, open courtyard, and watchtowers for fortresses.

Wet, dry, and permanent marker erasable.

Expands the Fortress starter set, compatible with the Fortress chambers expansion.

boardgame.name: Pathfinder Flip-Tiles: Fortress Starter Set
boardgame.description:
42 double-sided 6" x 6" color map tiles to create castles or imposing fortresses full of places for defenders to make their last stand.

Wet, dry, and permanent marker erasable.

Compatible with the Fortress walls & towers and Fortress chambers expansions.

boardgame.name: Sobek: 2 joueurs – Les Trésors du Pharaon
boardgame.description:
Les Trésors du Pharaon ("The Pharaoh's Treasures") features the new, highly sought-after Pharaoh tiles to add on the Market board. These extraordinary items stand out for their value, of course, but also for their versatility, as they can be used in sets of either of the 2 depicted goods. However, they also come with Corruption, so think twice before you leap on them…

This expansion also includes 2 new Characters tiles and 2 new Pirogue tokens.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Orichalque
boardgame.description:
Orichalque is a tense and fast-pace strategy game – similar to a short 4X. Each player has their own Island board to explore and develop. On each turn, they choose a set of one Exploration tile and one Action : recruit hoplites, produce precious orichalcum (a legendary metal from Greek mythology), construct buildings granting powerful bonuses, or try to get rid of Monsters infesting your island (and preventing you to build new building).

To prevail, you will need to erect majestic temples, forge orichalcum tokens or win the favors of titans (by creating areas of their favorite landscapes. The first to get to 5 victory points while clearing their Island of all Monsters wins the game.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Chicken-Fox-Snake
boardgame.description:
It is a board game between two players on either side of a board.

Each pawn moves 3 squares horizontally and/or vertically, if a pawn ends up on a square with an opposing pawn it can capture it if it meets the following conditions: the chicken eats the snake, the snake eats the fox, the fox eat the chicken.

The first player to capture 4 pawns wins.

boardgame.name: The Between: Season Two
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Season 2 of The Between expands the innovative game of gothic horror with a new playbook, a new Mastermind, and 4 new Threats. You must have a copy of The Between to use this material.

Details of what you'll find in Season 2:

The Unquiet A new hunter is joining Hargrave House: The Unquiet! This character is the ghost of a hunter who lived in Hargrave House many decades ago. They were betrayed by one of their contemporaries, and are now haunting Hargrave House until they can destroy the descendant of the one who betrayed them. They will help the current residents of Hargrave House until they are able to exact their revenge.

Admiral Flagg A new, terrifying enemy has appeared to challenge Hargrave House: Vice Admiral Flagg! Unlike Theodora Brathwaite, Admiral Flagg considers himself a loyal servant of the Queen. Unfortunately, that loyalty entails destroying the city of London itself, which Flagg considers to be a rot and stain on the British Empire. Admiral Flagg introduces elements of cosmic horror to your campaign of The Between.

The Spider Silk Seamstress The Spider Silk Seamstress is a new Threat by Gabriel Robinson. It introduces the world of the Fae to The Between. Sir Richard Harlowe, an ally of Hargrave House, has been found dead, hollowed out and wrapped in silk-like threads. Hargrave House learns that a Fae creature in the guise of an alluring fashion designer is behind the murder. Can they stop the Fae creature before she claims more victims among London's social elite?

The Demon of Kilburn Abbey The Demon of Kilburn Abbey is a new Threat by Petra Volkhausen. It introduces demonic terrors to The Between. The monks of Kilburn Abbey are being tormented by an unholy entity after recent renovation work: the corpse of a young girl was found walled up in the abbey, and whatever dark forces she summoned to her while trapped there is now loose in the world. Can Hargrave House banish the demon... or will they choose a darker path that sees them trying to control it for their own ends?

The St. Petersburg Mirror The St. Petersburg Mirror is a new Threat by David Morrison. Along with The Whateley Camera from Season 1, it's the second Threat that focuses on an object of power. A young civil servant is being blackmailed by shadowy forces that use a supposed medium, Madam Serafima, to gather information about their marks. Hargrave House wouldn't normally be interested in such a matter, if not for some details that indicate Madam Serafima might possess an actual object of power, the legendary St. Petersburg Mirror.

The West End Wraith The West End Wraith is a new Threat by David Morrison. It's inspired by The Phantom of the Operaand The Hunchback of Notre Dame. A popular musical venue in the West End is being "haunted" by the so-called West End Wraith. But is the Wraith really a wraith, and are their intentions actually foul, or are their actions a misguided attempt to protect someone who works at the venue? Hargrave House investigates to uncover the truth of the matter.

boardgame.name: The Perspective (Volume 8, Issue 1 - Jan 2022)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Latest edition of the Perspective. Note of Thanks. Partial new cover for SM3.0.

boardgame.name: Ruin of Bleak Hill (OSR)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Mottled Spire’s wild, rugged uplands lie beyond the Selka River. Crumbling ruins and abandoned mines—the leavings of civilisation’s ebbing tide—dot the hills. One such place is the isolated wind-blasted ruin of Bleak Hill Manor. Here once dwelled the wizard-sage Ilmatar Tiera before her untimely death at unknown hands. The centuried ruin—decayed and crumbled—has alternately lain abandoned or served as the lair of marauders, bandits and worse. Now, however, events conspire to focus certain interested parties upon the ruin, and all such folk are in need of adventurers brave enough to dare the terrors of the Mottled Spire.

This Dungeon Backdrop is designed to work with the Lonely Coast campaign setting but can be easily inserted into almost any fantasy campaign.

boardgame.name: Murder at Morley's Workshop
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Set in a frontier town, nestled on a snowy plain, the Murder at Morley’s Workshop is a winter one shot adventure for 5e. Positioned at the edge of the village, next to an ancient woodland, Morley’s workshop is the focus of a grisly crime. A man driven by savage hatred murders his cousin. The resulting spilling of blood, combined with the man’s malice, calls forth a vicious Fey creature from the crimson pool. In turn this twisted magic then beacons a crazed animal from the dark wood beyond. The party of adventurers are called to the location as the town alarm goes up with the sighting of the giant bear at the workshop. It is prowling around the building and the large workshop door appears to be open...

boardgame.name: Stwory z Obory: Wielkie Nordobicie
boardgame.description:
Are barns and forests deserted and all highroads trod? Are there no beasts on the horizon cuz they were slaughtered in a hundred ways? Do you laze around watching the sack full of coins? Soon enough you will be awaken by fall breeze from north!

Take out your disguises, sharpen the pitchfork and ... watch out for the arrows in the knee! Here comes the Wielkie Nordobicie ("Grand North-brawl"), an expansion to Stwory z Obory (Beats from the Barn) - original Polish party card game with black humour.

Wielkie Nordobicie contains 54 cards filled with Nordic mythology. Video games fans will also notice some easter eggs, eg. Wrzaski Mocy {Power Yells) or strzał w kolano (arrow in the knee). In this expansion you'll once again find characteristic Tomasz Bolik's arts.

This expansion adds new mechanics, eg. 6-players game, weapons and stuff crafting and temporary alliances in order to fight might Giants.

Wielkie Nordobicie is a perfect gift for teenagers looking for negative interaction party game with specific humour and for all those lovers of Stwory z Oboory.

—description from the publisher (translated)

boardgame.name: Aeronautica Imperialis: Wings of Vengeance – Emperor's Blessing Card
boardgame.description:
Card found in Issue 470 of the magazine White Dwarf.

Marauder 'Ace' Payload: A single Marauder Bomber or Marauder Destroyer may purchase this ace for +4 points. Once per game, when firing its Bomb Bay weapon, the aircraft may add 4 to the FPR characteristic.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Aeronautica Imperialis: Taros Air War Campaign Book

boardgame.name: Lineup
boardgame.description:
The Lineup is set and it’s time for you to identify your friends!

In Lineup, you’ll be asking the group questions that have a numeric answer. Then, you’ll create a lineup of your friends based on how you think they’ve answered! The most accurate predictor wins!

Lineup is based off the smash-hit CUT show with over 1.2 billion views to date!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Bonus Level Up Perks
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

So you’ve decided you want to use bonus level up perks in your
game. But where do you get the ideas you need to work with?

Ask your players what they’re aiming for.

boardgame.name: Bonus Level Up Perks Vol. 2
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Bonus Level Up Perks are additional small boons that you can grant your players as they level up. They help you to reward your players by allowing them to more accurately tailor their character to the fantasy they want to play. Sometimes your inspiration for these perks will be based on the way they play their characters and sometimes it will be based on requests from the players. Other times, it can help to take a look at what makes the character tick. Focus on their background, their bonds and ideals, their backstory. A character from a lineage thought extinct could easily gain a perk that allows them to surprise the nobility into showing their true colours.

boardgame.name: Unlocked
boardgame.description:
You might keep secrets but
Your phone knows the truth.

By the end of the night, we’ll all be better friends after sharing things we never thought we would…like Netflix passwords.

Drink up, it’s time to unlock the dirty truth.

In Unlocked players take turns pulling cards and either asking questions or proposing dares to the group. Each round there will be one winner declared who will receive the card as a point. At the end of play, the player with the most points wins.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Dangerous Destinations
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

The definitive guide to creating intriguing and dynamic destinations for storytelling and fantasy roleplaying games.

boardgame.name: Sly Flourish's The Lazy DM's Companion
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Lazy DM's Companion is a book of guidelines and inspirational generators to help you build, prepare, and run awesome D&D games. Sitting alongside Sly Flourish's Return of the Lazy Dungeon Master and Sly Flourish's The Lazy DM's Workbook, the Lazy DM's Companion streamlines play and fires off your imagination to build awesome and unique worlds for you and your players to explore.

boardgame.name: The Pearl of Water
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

When the party arrives at Talanthyr´s house they are most likely rested. He therefore let´s them look in his crystal ball. The vision they see shows them the lake from above and plunges down toward the burried city, goes through the air dome and down the pit, then following the tunnel and ending in the chamber where the Pearl of Water rests on an pedastal in the middle.

boardgame.name: Family Meme Night
boardgame.description:
From the creators of What Do You Meme?

Match the funniest caption to the photo to make your own Meme!

The goal of Family Meme Night is to win the most Photo Cards by coming up with the funniest Caption Card/Photo Card combos. The target number of Photo Cards needed to win varies by the number of players.

boardgame.name: Net Topics from ADND-L
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

One day I was reading the mails I had received through the mailing list, and I find a thread that I really liked, I decided to compile so I could have a reference sheet for my own game, when suddenly it hit me, perhaps others were interested in this too...
...
So now here is the netbook of ”Net-Topics”...

User summary:

This document presents numerous articles and "Q&A" discussions derived from an old AD&D emailing list.

boardgame.name: The Freestyle RPG Basic Rules
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Roleplaying games (RPGs) can be some of the most rewarding games to play. If you have the right mix of people, playing a RPG game can be a rich experience. Ideally, players will learn that teamwork pays and treachery leads to disaster (unless you are playing Paranoia). If you do not have this experience, find a new game.

A RPG has two key sets of people: a game master (GM) who makes up the world and runs the session, and players who play characters in that world.

The Freestyle Role Playing Game is “skill based.” With the GM’s approval, the players can develop any skill they want. A player’s attributes affect the players ability to perform a task. The rules are used determine the success and failure of a players actions.

The Freestyle RPG rules cover a number of different areas. Many are included to give the ability to have worlds that are mixed genre. For example, they employ magic and technology. The Game Master (GM) should pick and choose what they need.

The rules are broken up into sections. The first sections describe character creation, skill development, action resolution and combat resolution. The rest of the document provides rules and source material to cover fantasy campaigns through science fiction campaigns.

Within the combat sections the rules allows for a variety of levels of detail. This was done to allow the GM to conduct the game in a more flexible fashion.

boardgame.name: The Halls of Light
boardgame.description:
From the publishers blurb:

The gnomes of Rockswald have asked for your help. They operate a mithrl mine, but it has recently been invaded by goblins. They will reward anyone who can rid them of the goblins.

The Halls of Light is a short, introductory adventure for beginning characters of any fantasy tabletop roleplaying game. It can fit easily into any fantasy world. It has been crafted with good dungeon design in mind.

boardgame.name: The Final Light-Year: The Mira Sector
boardgame.description:
February 2022 episode for The Final Light-Year.

This kit adds a new sector map, new overlord, minion and commander, and a new crew member.


Released in the February 2022 Board Game of the Month Club $5+ package.

boardgame.name: AdvanceQuest: The New Hill
boardgame.description:
AdvanceQuest is a compact adventure system. Generate a character with any traits you want, and advance your way through the story, rolling dice against challenges and trying to reach the end.

The quiet village of Berryside isn't known for adventure... but that's about to change. Steel yourself to face the mysterious threat that dwells inside The New Hill.

A new chapter in the AdvanceQuest story is coming.

Using a clever new exploration mechanic, each foray into the story will offer different challenges using a simple combination of two elements. Select two of your own traits and roll off against the two story elements, and see if you can beat the dangerous situation. If you roll well, you survive to continue on. If you fail, you will take damage. But don't despair – you can spend Stamina to re-roll dice before you apply their effects! If you can make it through the story, you win! Your score is how many treasures you manage to collect along the way – see if you can beat your high score by playing again!

In The New Hill you will protect the village of Berryside from ravenous insect creatures that are attacking the town and all who inhabit it. This is the second AdvanceQuest adventure.

—description from the publisher


A solo micro-game designed by C.C. Chamberlin, based on Dungeon Hero. Create a hero using eight defining characteristics, like Archer of the Realm or Chainmail or Stealthy. Assign them dice ranging from d12 to d6. Note your Health and Stamina levels, and then start the adventure.
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: Dungeon Hero: Volume Two – Giant Beasts

boardgame.name: UeStop!
boardgame.description:
UeStop! is an exciting competitive word game for 2-6 player, where players test their knowledge and their reflex, struggling to be the first one to find the correct word with the correct letter.

The game is played in turns and in each turn there is a card with one of the four possible colors (green, yellow, red, blue), also showing 4 categories on four edges of the card and 4 different letters in the middle of the card. These 4 letters are presented in colored bubbles, matching the colors of the cards.

After all the players have read the categories and are ready, another card is opened and then, the players will try to be the first one to put their hand over the card and say one word with the starting letter indicated on the colored bubble of the second card that matches the color of the first card.

If the player answers correctly, she gains the card as a reward worth one point. Another turn starts and the game continues until any player gets 5 points.

This is the basic to play UeStop!, but the game also contains 3 new game modes that will challenge the players with new rules and adding strategy to the gameplay.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers – War of the Realms
boardgame.description:
Be the Mightiest in All of the Realms!

Thor and the Avengers take on Malekith and other Asgardian threats!

Based on the realms-shattering The War of the Realms event, this HeroClix set combines some of the coolest Thor stuff with the hottest game play of the year!

This 5-figure booster release features fan-favorite characters like Thor, Captain America, Mary Jane, Gamora, Wasp, Angela, Yondu, Nova, Black Widow, and more!
Avengers The War of the Realms has more characters with RALLY that was first introduced in X-Men Rise and Fall earlier this year as well as brand-new mechanics like Recruiter!

MISSION POINTS make a triumphant return, and players will unlock all-new ways to win!

Shifting Focus is back too, so players will get to plays many versions of their favorite characters!

Also find brand new “Legacy” cards for figures that might already be in your collection!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Fantastic Four Empyre Miniatures Game

boardgame.name: Heart of the Dragon's Stone
boardgame.description:
"Crops have failed, conscription has begun, armies are preparing to march: confronting Skullack Rackskull the dragon is underway.

You and your companions, with the possible help of others, calculate that while armies battle the dragon, else kills or wounds it, you can sneak in and plunder its treasures.

It's a simple and easy plan, if you exclude the details and the dangers, which will become evident, depending on your decisions that you make."

(Author Summary)

boardgame.name: MimocirQ
boardgame.description:
Greatly inspired by the Cirque du Soleil imagery, MimocirQ brings you irresistable cards featuring a cast of zany characters in dazzling colours!

To collect the most sets of three identical cards, you will need to make the facial expression of body position shown on the wanted card.

Sounds easy? Try it and see... without bursting into laughing.
