boardgame.name: Broken Tusk Moon
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

or generations, the Broken Tusk following has roamed their small patch of the Realm of the Mammoth Lords in relative peace. Now, to avoid annihilation from a maniacal war horde, they must flee into the unknown. If the Broken Tusks are to survive their flight, a team of their best scouts will need to chart a safe path through an unforgiving wilderness. Along the way, they'll uncover the mysteries of a powerful artifact that promises to change the course of history.

"Broken Tusk Moon" is a Pathfinder adventure for four 1st-level characters. This adventure begins the Quest for the Frozen Flame Adventure Path, a three-part monthly campaign in which the heroes lead a band of nomadic hunter-gatherers across a brutal primordial landscape. This adventure also includes a catalog of the characters' band, the Broken Tusks; new spells, feats, and items perfect for trappers and foragers; and new prehistoric creatures to befriend or bedevil your players.

Each monthly full-color softcover Pathfinder Adventure Path volume contains an in-depth adventure scenario, stats for several new monsters, and support articles meant to give Game Masters additional material to expand their campaign. Pathfinder Adventure Path volumes use the Open Game License and work with both the Pathfinder RPG and the world's oldest fantasy RPG.

boardgame.name: Alarums & Excursions (Issue 555 - February 2022)
boardgame.description:
Alarums & Excursions
Issue 555
February 2022
Ignorable Theme: If a description said that somebody / something was “monstrous,” give at least a couple of examples of what he / she / it / they might look like.

boardgame.name: Serial Killer: Second Edition
boardgame.description:
Serial Killer 2nd Edition is a 4-50 players bluffing and hidden role game.

In Victorian era, surrounded by crime and suspicion, the citizens and police must find and arrest the killers before blood of the innocents are spread everywhere in the city.

When the game begins, the Serial Killer can "kill" other people by secretly sending the signal (eg. touching, nudging, winking etc.) And whenever a player receives the signal, He/She must die and be eliminated. However, If a Police is eliminated, It's time to find the Serial Killer(s)! the remaining players must discuss and vote for elimination. The Citizen team wins when all Serial Killers are eliminated. In contrast, the Criminal team wins when the number of Serial Killer(s) equals to half of the remaining players, or all Police and Detectives are eliminated.

boardgame.name: Pizza Master Revised Edition
boardgame.description:
Pizza Master Revised Edition is a 2-5 players strategy game.

Each player is a trainee in the “Pizza Wizard” to prove themselves worthy of “The Next Pizza Master” title.

Pizza Master starts by taking orders from customers, buying, and stocking up on quality ingredients for your dishes. However, every trainee works in the same kitchen. So if you have your eye on you may be snatched up by other trainees at any time! And you will be punished for any leftover! Finally, The player with the most reputation points wins the title of “The Pizza Master”

Pizza Master Revised Edition has the new rule to easier understand, expanded menu, and more daunting challenges. Moreover, the kitchen has been renovated for the exciting showdown!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: 27 Metres
boardgame.description:
27 Metres, a party game for 2- players, taking place in space, the hundreds of kilometers above the earth.

An unexpected event happened in space station. The large space debris has crashed, and we need to perform maintenance. Unfortunately, there is the cable tether with a length of only 27 meters left. Fatal mission which everyone must take turns releasing cable to send people to repair the station by putting a card which indicates the length of the cable that has been released. Then, draw a card from your deck and show it to everyone before putting it into your hand. There is no room for error, any actions causing the cable to break will result in disciplinary actions from the captain and suspension.

Tower Tactic Games (The Stronghold) collaborates with Thai game designer who creates Cabbage Farm and The Coding. Along with the same illustrator from Tan-staR as Serial Killer. 27 Metres is the first game from Solar Crisis Series that is easy to play for players of all ages.

boardgame.name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl
boardgame.description: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl is a crossover fighting game
boardgame.videogamehonor: 2021 The Game Awards Best Fighting Game of the Year Nominee

boardgame.name: Princess Connect! Re:Dive
Purinsesu Konekuto! Ridaibu
プリンセスコネクト！Re:Dive
boardgame.description:
After the events of Princess Connect!, the Twinkle Wish guild ascend the Tower of Sol where they reach the very top and encounter Mana Senri who merged with Minerva. After wiping out Hiyori and Rei, Yuuki is severely injured and shields Yui from an attack before he is engulfed by Mana's attack. Yuuki awakens in an unknown location and meets Ameth, who seems to be familiar with him. With no time, she sends him down to Landsol where he is given a vague mission that he must do.

Upon awakening, Yuuki has lost all memory. He is met by Kokkoro, a girl assigned by Ameth to be his guide on his adventures. Shortly afterwards he meets a swordswoman with a voracious appetite, whom the duo nickname Pecorine, and later a cat-beast race girl Karyl. The group founds the guild Gourmet Edifice with the goal of going on adventures while eating the food that Landsol has to offer. As for Yuuki, he is determined to recover his memories and complete the mission Ameth has in store for him.
boardgame.videogamehonor: 2021 Operation Rainfall Awards Best Nintendo Handheld Game of the Year Winner

boardgame.name: Escape Adventures Adventskalender: Die geheimnisvolle Burg
boardgame.description:
It is cold. Snow melts on the skin. Winter has come. Suddenly you find yourself in an ice-blue world full of knights, alchemists and long-forgotten creatures. Start your story on December 1 and behind each door find out which door you need to open next. The mystery of sabotaged festivities and an ancient castle are waiting to be explored. Riddles must be solved and shady items like Rubik's cubes or puzzle pieces must be combined to reach the end of the story. Will you find the exit to escape the Escape Room by Christmas? Find out!

-description by the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Misc: Advent / Christmas / Jule calendar game

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Half Match
boardgame.description:
Are you brave enough to make a monster? Make monster matches by describing your half monster and collecting the matching half from other players. The cards can be used in a variety of other ways
to strengthen expressive language, listening, and memory skills while having fun!

The player with the most matches, wins.

boardgame.name: Hinterhalt & Sturmangriff
boardgame.description:
Publishers bblurb

Ambush & Storm Attack is an adventure anthology for the 5th rules edition of the traditional fantasy role-playing game The Dark Eye. It was designed to be played with floor plans and markers from the Tools of the Master boxes, but can easily be played without these aids.

Marked cards takes the group of heroes to the Svellt Valley, where during a game of Boltan they meet a gold prospector who recruits them as escorts. Together they head into the wilderness of Svelltland, to a place where gold and star metal are believed to exist. While the heroes learn how to mine for metals and set up camp, they face all sorts of dangerous challenges: a bloodthirsty orc tribe, fierce monsters, and greedy competition make life difficult for them.

In The Days of Fire adventure, on the other hand, the group of heroes moves to Almada. They are assigned to look after the small village of Wildenfest. There have been arsons there, and the villagers whisper behind closed doors that supernatural forces are behind them. The heroes follow a few leads in Wildenfest, have to deal with robbers, wild animals and the arsonists - and finally get on the trail of a danger from long forgotten times.

In The Cult of the Black Dagger, the heroes in Riva accidentally witness a kidnapping in the town hall square and - heroic as they are - try to help the victim. In the process, the adventurers get on the trail of a dark cult that has no good intentions for its kidnap victim. In the classic manner of a dungeon, the heroes penetrate the cultists' lair and have to deal with hungry ghouls, the fanatical cultists, undead and even worse creatures.


Klappentext

Hinterhalt & Sturmangriff ist eine Abenteuer-Anthologie für die 5. Regeledition des traditionsreichen Fantasy-Rollenspiels Das Schwarze Auge. Sie wurde für das Spiel mit Bodenplänen und Markern aus den Werkzeuge des Meisters-Boxen entwickelt, aber kann auch problemlos ohne diese Hilfsmittel gespielt werden.

Gezinkte Karten führt die Heldengruppe ins Svellttal, wo sie bei einer Partie Boltan einen Goldschürfer kennenlernen, der sie als Begleitschutz anwirbt. Gemeinsam geht es in die Wildnis des Svelltlandes, zu einem Ort, an dem man Gold und Sternenmetall vermutet. Während die Helden lernen, wie man nach Metallen schürft, und sich um den Aufbau des Lagers kümmern, müssen sie sich allerlei gefährlichen Herausforderungen stellen: ein blutrünstiger Ork-Stamm, wilde Ungeheuer und die habgierige Konkurrenz machen ihnen das Leben schwer.

Im Abenteuer Tage des Feuers verschlägt es die Heldengruppe hingegen nach Almada. Sie werden beauftragt, im kleinen Dorf Wildenfest nach dem Rechten zu sehen. Dort kam es zu Brandstiftungen, und die Dörfler flüstern hinter vorgehaltener Hand, dass übernatürliche Mächte dahintersteckten. Die Helden gehen in Wildenfest einigen Spuren nach, müssen sich mit Räubern, wilden Tieren und den Brandstiftern auseinandersetzen – und kommen schließlich einer Gefahr aus längst vergessener Zeit auf die Spur.

In Der Kult des Schwarzen Dolches werden die Helden in Riva zufällig Zeuge einer Entführung auf dem Rathausplatz und versuchen – heldenhaft, wie sie nun mal sind – dem Opfer zu helfen. Dabei kommen die Abenteurer einem dunklen Kult auf die Spur, der nichts Gutes mit seinem Entführungsopfer vorhat. In klassischer Manier eines Dungeons dringen die Helden in das Versteck der Kultisten ein und müssen sich mit hungrigen Gruftasseln, den fanatischen Kultisten, Untoten und sogar noch schlimmeren Wesen auseinandersetzen.

boardgame.name: Meisterschirmset - Straßenstaub & Halsabschneider
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

No more tedious leafing through old tomes! The TDE5 Master Screen contains all the important tables that support the game master in running an adventure. On the four inner pages of the umbrella, important information about talent use, combat, magic and gods are clearly summarized, so that tedious searching in books is a thing of the past.

This master's screen booklet includes trade rules and equipment tables to help your heroes prepare for upcoming battles, as well as geographic and cultural information about Aventuria's roads and cities. For the heroes, this companion booklet makes travel easier, while helping the players bring both the journey and the stay to life, enriching it with information that is true to the place and time.


Klappentext

Kein langwieriges Blättern in alten Folianten mehr! Der DSA5-Meisterschirm enthält alle wichtigen Tabellen, die den Spieleiterinnen und Spielleitern beim Leiten eines Abenteuers unterstützen. Auf den insgesamt vier Innenseiten des Schirms sind wichtige Angaben zu Talenteinsatz, Kampf, Magie und Götterwirken übersichtlich zusammengefasst, sodass mühseliges Suchen in Büchern der Vergangenheit angehört.

Dieses Meisterschirmbegleitheft enthält neben Handelsregeln und Ausrüstungstabellen, mit deren Hilfe sich deine Helden auf bevorstehende Kämpfe vorbereiten können, geographische und kulturelle Informationen über Aventuriens Straßen und Städte. Den Helden erleichtert dieses Begleitheft die Reise, während die Spielerschaft dabei unterstützt wird, sowohl Reise als auch Aufenthalt lebendig zu gestalten und mit orts- und zeitgetreuen Informationen anzureichern.

boardgame.name: Spielkartenset Heldenerschaffung
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

If you want to have the creation of a hero even faster than TDE5 rules offer, you can switch to a system that allows an intuitive and fast creation with cards. The fast hero creation is very simple: As a player you choose species, culture, profession and a background, add the values on the cards and your hero is ready. The Hero Creation Set offers you this system in card form.


Klappentext

Wer die Erschaffung eines Helden noch schneller haben möchte, als dies DSA5-Regeln anbieten, der kann auf ein System wechseln, welches eine intuitive und rasante Erschaffung mit Karten erlaubt. Die schnelle Heldenerschaffung ist ganz einfach: Als Spielerin wählst du Spezies, Kultur, Profession und einen Hintergrund aus, addierst die Werte auf den Karten und fertig ist dein Held. Das Heldenerschaffungsset bietet dir dieses System in Kartenform.

boardgame.name: Spielkartenset Zustand und Status
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

This deck of playing cards gives you turn cards for statuses and conditions. If a hero suffers from a certain condition level, this can be indicated by the card as well as a status the hero is subject to. This allows players and masters to keep track of a hero's condition levels and statuses.


Klappentext

Dieses Spielkartenset bietet dir Wendekarten für Status und Zustände. Leidet ein Held an einer bestimmten Zustandsstufe, kann dies von der Karte ebenso angezeigt werden, wie ein Status, dem der Held ausgesetzt ist. So können Spieler und Meister eine Übersicht über die Zustandsstufen und Status eines Helden bewahren.

boardgame.name: Warhammer 40,000 (Ninth Edition): Codex – Adeptus Custodes
boardgame.description:
The Adeptus Custodes are demigods of war, sworn to defend the Emperor to their last breath. In this dark and dangerous age, that mission compels them away from Holy Terra and out into the stars, for no longer can they stand upon the ramparts of the Imperial Palace and watch the galaxy burn. They are the most elite warriors in the Imperium, clad in auramite armour and wielding some of the finest weapons ever created by Mankind. Whether teleporting into the heart of battle, storming to war aboard ancient Land Raiders or streaking through the skies astride Dawneagle jetbikes, the Custodians are death incarnate to their enemies. Alongside them fight the Sisters of Silence, a secretive order of psychic blanks to whom falls the task of protecting the Imperium from rogue psykers and sorcerers. Together, they are the Talons of the Emperor, and where they take to the field no foe of the Emperor can stop them.

This mighty tome contains pages of background and rules dedicated to the Emperor's most elite guardians – the Adeptus Custodes. Discover the history and hierarchy of the Talons of the Emperor, and the legendary heroes that have stood by the Emperor's side for over 10,000 years, as well as the myriad ways they wage war in Terra's name.

Inside the 104-page hardback book, you'll find:

In-depth background and lore on the Adeptus Custodes and the Sisters of Silence, who make up the Talons of the Emperor, plus information about War Zone: Terra, where the Custodes battle insidious threats
Exquisite art that exemplifies the deific nature of these unparalleled warriors
All the rules you need to play your Adeptus Custodes army, including 20 datasheets covering every unit from the brand new Blade Champion to the Custodian Guard and Prosecutors
A full suite of rules for playing Crusade and narrative games, including Agendas, Battle Traits, Requisitions, Crusade Relics, plus Battle Scars, and Artefacts of the Vault Relics unique to the Adeptus Custodes
An 'Eavy Metal miniatures showcase including variant Adeptus Custodes colour schemes


—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Trash-TV: Promis, Pannen, Peinlichkeiten
boardgame.description:
"I’m only in this for the money“, „I don’t have photograph for you today“ and dramatic slo-mo of tearstruck faces – you know what that‘s about: Common phrases and events from reality TV (or lovingly called „Trash-TV“).

Created by Trash-TV expert @anredo this game serves as a companion for most reality tv shows, where you play along to find out who can get rid of the most cards. Whenever a quote or event happens on the show or at home in your living room, that you just happen to have on one of your cards, you may get rid of that card.
Examples include "someone uses a sob story about a bad relationship with one of their family members" or "someone adjust the volume on your device at home".

The player who manages to get rid of all their cards first wins. If at the end of the show no one managed to lose all their cards, the player with the fewest cards wins.

boardgame.name: Der Sturz des Adlers
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

The Alanfan offensive against the Káhet Ni Kemi advances inexorably. But the Boron-pleasing war campaign that Oderin du Metuant leads together with Rhônda IX Setepen against her sister Ela XV is not only confronted with fierce military resistance from the Kemi and their allies. Efforts are also being made in the political arena to undermine the interests of the crowned raven. The Horasian envoy Mariano ya Strozza leads the way, not only throwing all his diplomatic weight into the scale, but also resorting to sabotage and assassination to damage the Alanfanian advance.

At the beginning of the third adventure of the Raven War campaign, the heroes have proven themselves reliable and prudent enough to receive their next assignment from Oderin du Metuant himself. Soon they find themselves in moral quandaries and may have to resort to rather unorthodox means to fulfill the Black General's will after all. The Fall of the Eagle can also be played separately from the campaign background.


Klappentext

Unaufhaltsam schreitet die alanfanische Offensive gegen das Káhet Ni Kemi voran. Doch der borongefällige Kriegszug, den Oderin du Metuant gemeinsam mit Rhônda IX. Setepen gegen deren Schwester Ela XV. führt, sieht sich nicht bloß mit erbittertem militärischem Widerstand seitens der Kemi und ihrer Verbündeten konfrontiert. Auch auf dem politischen Parkett werden Anstrengungen unternommen, die Interessen des gekrönten Raben zu hintertreiben. Federführend ist hierbei der horasische Gesandte Mariano ya Strozza, der nicht nur all sein diplomatisches Gewicht in die Waagschale wirft, sondern auch auf Sabotage und Mordanschläge zurückgreift, um dem alanfanischen Vorstoß zu schaden.

Zu Beginn des dritten Abenteuers der Rabenkrieg-Kampagne haben sich die Helden als zuverlässig und besonnen genug erwiesen, um ihre nächste Aufgabe von Oderin du Metuant persönlich zu erhalten. Bald finden sie sich in moralischen Zwickmühlen wieder und müssen womöglich zu recht unorthodoxen Mitteln greifen, um den Willen des Schwarzen Generals doch noch zu erfüllen. Der Sturz des Adlers ist auch losgelöst aus dem Kampagnenhintergrund spielbar.

boardgame.name: Escape Adventures Adventskalender: Die verwunschenen Eisruinen
boardgame.description:
Probably the most exciting Advent season ever! Join adventurer Edda on the greatest journey of discovery of his life.
You have only 24 days to find the exit with Eddas faithful companions Spike and Luna, trapped in an underground ice ruin. Manage your rations well, open doors and deactivate frosty traps to get closer to escape. Meet mystical creatures, icy sculptures and solve a mystery of a long forgotten culture every day.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Misc: Advent / Christmas / Jule calendar game

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: EscapeBox: Virus
boardgame.description:
EscapeBox is a board game that provides you with an exciting escape room experience. You can think with your friends, family or co-workers, put together clues, find a way out of the predicament you are in, and complete your mission. You do not have a simple task ahead! You have to be focused and precise. Even things that seem very trivial may help you. Be aware of time! You do not have much time to complete this mission.

Virus is the name of your first mission. The world needs your help to prevent a human catastrophe. To succeed in this mission, you have to overcome many challenges and obstacles. You and your teammates must be able to decipher many locks by solving various puzzles. You only have 75 minutes to save humanity.

boardgame.name: Die Krallen der Löwin
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

Determined, the army of the Al'anfan Empire moves on to free the Káhet Ni Kemi from the rule of the tyrannical Nisut Ela XV Setepen and to help her sister Rhônda IX to her rightful throne. After the Kemi have so far successfully repelled an advance of the attackers into the interior, Al'Anfa now gathers its best troops at Yleha in order to unite and march south to face the troops of the Kemi general Chanya al'Plâne in a battle that could possibly decide the entire Raven War.
But forces are at work in the background, secretly working to ensure the failure of the Black General Oderin du Metuant. While everyone is eagerly awaiting the impending decisive battle, the Ravenclaws in turn find themselves targeted by the conspirators.

The fourth adventure of the Raven's Claw campaign is the action-packed climax of Al'Anfa's military campaign against the Kemi kingdom. While the encounter with the enemy forces is undoubtedly a significant milestone in the Boron campaign, there is much more at stake for the heroes.

The Lioness' Claws can also be played separately from the campaign background.


Klappentext

Entschlossen zieht das Heer des al’anfanischen Imperiums weiter, um in einem borongefälligen Kriegszug das Káhet Ni Kemi von der Herrschaft der tyrannischen Nisut Ela XV. Setepen zu befreien und ihrer Schwester Rhônda IX. auf ihren rechtmäßigen Thron zu verhelfen. Nachdem die Kemi ein Vordringen der Angreifer ins Landesinnere bisher erfolgreich abwehren konnten, versammelt Al’Anfa nun bei Yleha seine besten Truppen, um vereint gen Süden zu ziehen und sich dort dem Aufgebot der kem’schen Generalin Chanya al’Plâne zu einer Schlacht zu stellen, die womöglich den gesamten Rabenkrieg entscheiden könnte.
Doch im Hintergrund wirken Kräfte, die heimlich auf ein Scheitern des Schwarzen Generals Oderin du Metuant hinarbeiten. Während alle der anstehenden Entscheidungsschlacht entgegenfiebern, geraten die Rabenkrallen ihrerseits ins Visier der Verschwörer.

Das vierte Abenteuer der Rabenkrieg-Kampagne stellt den actiongeladenen Höhepunkt der Militärkampagne Al’Anfas gegen das Königreich der Kemi dar. Bedeutet das Zusammentreffen mit den feindlichen Truppen fraglos einen bedeutsamen Meilenstein des Boronzuges, steht für die Helden jedoch noch deutlich mehr auf dem Spiel.

Die Krallen der Löwin ist auch losgelöst aus dem Kampagnenhintergrund spielbar.

boardgame.name: 7Seas
boardgame.description:
Finally! After long journeys across the seven seas, you've found it: the treasure island with immeasurable amounts of gold, sparkling crystals, and tasty rum. But no sooner has your ship landed than others show up to capture the most valuable things for themselves. What's more, the island is stricken by evil curses...and then there is also the kraken — which is both a blessing and a curse at the same time.

In 7Seas, you want to use cards in hand to capture those on the table, but if you can't grab something, then you'll end up leaving goods for others to grab.

The deck consists of 40 cards in four suits (gold, rum, crystals, and curses); each card shows a strength value (1-10) and a booty value (from 7 to -7). Each player has a ship that starts at the beginning of the track, and a game lasts until a player reaches 7, 11, or 14 on the track, depending on the length of the game desired. To set up a round, deal 4 cards face up as a display, deal each player 8 or 11 cards depending on the player count, then place 3 or 4 cards aside as a special booty pile.

On a turn, play one card from your hand. If a card in the display has the same strength as this card, you collect both cards. If instead two or more cards sum to the value of your played card, you collect those smaller cards and your played card. If you play a non-cursed 1, you can collect a 10 in the display (along with your 1), assuming no 1s are present. If you play the kraken (the cursed 1), then you can take all of the cards in the display along with the kraken — but the kraken is -7 points, so it better be worth it! If you can't collect a card, then you add your card to the display. If you ever clear all the cards in the display, then you steal one card, either from an opponent's collection or from the booty pile, looking those cards over and choosing your prize.

Once all the cards have been played — and cards are played in two cycles of eight cards in a two-player game — players score points depending on what they've collected:


The player with the most cards moves their ship one space.
The player with the most gold coins moves one space.
The player with the pirate lady or pirate king (respectively the 1 crystal and 1 rum) moves one space.
The player with the highest booty total — that is, the sum of the highest card in each suit — moves two spaces.


Continue playing rounds until someone moves their ship to the finish line.

listing.notes:
The game is new and still in shrink wrap!
I will ship from Germany and I am willing to ship anywhere.
Please ask me, for the shipping costs for your land.
I will charge shipping at cost. Everything will be well packed.
You can pay me through Paypal or bank transfer to my German bank account but any fees charged must be covered by you.
If you buy more games, then I make all in one package!
We have a large private collection of games. Due to space and time constraints we must rid ourselves of some of the games. Therefore, these are private sales.

boardgame.name: Der Preis des Greifen
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

After defeating the army of the Kemi loyalists, the al'anfan forces plan to advance along the eastern coast of Trahelia into the heart of the Kemi Empire. But there is one last obstacle to overcome: the Tirob River. The only bridge lies in the Middle Kingdom protectorate of Hôt-Alem, which has so far remained neutral in the conflict between the two Meridian empires, but will not simply accept an unhindered passage of the troops under the sign of the crowned raven. Leading the entire foot force through impassable rainforests would take several weeks and give the Kemi the opportunity to regroup.
Diplomatic skill is needed to convince the rulers in the Sun City to side with the mighty empire of Al'Anfa and allow the Boron train free passage. Who would be better suited for such an urgent task than the specialists of the Raven Claws?

The fifth adventure of the Raven War campaign grants respite from the travails of the train through steamy jungles. But in Hôt-Alem it is now necessary to fight through no less dangerous swamps of a completely different kind.

The Price of the Griffin is also playable separately from the campaign background.


Klappentext

Nach dem Sieg über das Heer der kem’schen Loyalisten planen die al’anfanischen Truppen, entlang der Ostküste Traheliens ins Herz des Kemi-Reiches vorzustoßen. Doch ein letztes Hindernis ist noch zu überwinden: der Fluss Tirob. Die einzige Brücke liegt im mittelreichischen Protektorat Hôt-Alem, das sich zwar bislang im Konflikt zwischen den beiden meridianischen Reichen neutral verhalten hat, aber einen ungehinderten Durchzug der Truppen unter dem Zeichen des gekrönten Raben dennoch nicht einfach so akzeptieren wird. Das gesamte Fußvolk durch unwegsame Regenwälder zu führen, würde mehrere Wochen in Anspruch nehmen und den Kemi Gelegenheit bieten, sich neu zu formieren.
Diplomatisches Geschick ist gefragt, um die Machthaber in der Sonnenstadt davon zu überzeugen, sich auf die Seite des mächtigen Imperiums von Al’Anfa zu schlagen und dem Boronszug freien Durchzug zu gestatten. Wer wäre für eine so drängende Aufgabe wohl besser geeignet als die Spezialisten der Rabenkrallen?

Das fünfte Abenteuer der Rabenkrieg-Kampagne gewährt eine Atempause von der Mühsal des Zuges durch Dampfende Dschungel. Doch in Hôt-Alem gilt es nun, sich durch nicht minder gefährliche Sümpfe einer völlig anderen Art zu schlagen.

Der Preis des Greifen ist auch losgelöst aus dem Kampagnenhintergrund spielbar.

boardgame.name: Der Fluch der Hornechse
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

Far and perilous was the path traveled by the al'anfan force led by the Black General Oderin du Metuant and the Kemi Princess Rhônda IX Setepen. Barely two months after the start of the Raven War, they have crossed Trahelia from north to south, removing along the way every obstacle that would prevent the outcast princess from claiming her rightful place on the throne of Káhet Ni Kemi. Now the victorious army stands before its final hurdle, the walls of the temple fortress of Laguana.
Here, at the holiest place in the Kemi faith, Rhônda's coronation as nisut must take place. Here her heretic sister Ela XIV and her hated mother Peri III have cowardly entrenched themselves. But they will not be able to escape the righteous grip of Al'Anfa, with whom all true Kemi are allied in the upright faith.

Once again it is up to the specialists of the Ravenclaws to penetrate the temple fortress and gain entry for the invaders. A furious finale is in the offing, but the ancient Echsian ruins beneath the temple complex are not its only setting, as the web of intrigue and conspiracy thickens and a noose tightens around perhaps the most influential neck in all of southern Venturia.

The sixth and final adventure of the Raven War campaign brings the story of the Boron Train to completion. Only the deeds of true heroes determine what may one day be read in the book of history about the momentous events of the train. The Curse of the Horned Lizard can also be played separately from the campaign background.

A TDE adventure for 3-6 heroes

To play you only need the The Dark Eye rulebook and the Aventurian Almanac, all other information for experiencing the adventures such as value boxes, maps and plans as well as handouts are included in the volume.


Klappentext

Weit und gefahrvoll war der Weg, den die al'anfanische Streitmacht unter Führung des Schwarzen Generals Oderin du Metuant und der Kemi-Prinzessin Rhônda IX. Setepen zurückgelegt hat. Kaum zwei Monate nach Beginn des Rabenkrieges haben sie Trahelien von Norden nach Süden durchquert und unterwegs jedes Hindernis beseitigt, das die verstoßene Prinzessin daran hindern wollte, ihren rechtmäßigen Platz auf dem Thron des Káhet Ni Kemi zu beanspruchen. Nun steht das siegreiche Heer vor seiner letzten Hürde, den Mauern der Tempelfestung Laguana.
Hier, am heiligsten Ort in der Glaubenswelt der Kemi, muss Rhôndas Krönung zur Nisut stattfinden. Hier haben sich ihre ketzerische Schwester Ela XIV. und ihre verhasste Mutter Peri III. feige verschanzt. Doch dem gerechten Zugriff Al'Anfas, mit dem alle wahren Kemi im aufrechten Glauben verbündet sind, werden sie sich nicht entziehen können.

Einmal mehr ist es an den Spezialisten der Rabenkrallen, in die Tempelfestung einzudringen und den Invasoren Einlass zu verschaffen. Ein furioses Finale kündigt sich an, doch sind nicht allein die uralten echsischen Ruinen unter der Tempelanlage sein Schauplatz, während sich das Netz der Intrigen und Verschwörungen verdichtet und eine Schlinge sich um den vielleicht einflussreichsten Hals in ganz Südaventurien legt.

Das sechste und letzte Abenteuer der Rabenkrieg-Kampagne bringt die Geschichte des Boronszuges zur Vollendung. Nur die Taten echter Helden bestimmen darüber, was dereinst im Buch der Geschichte über die folgenschweren Ereignisse des Zuges zu lesen sein mag. Der Fluch der Hornechse ist auch losgelöst aus dem Kampagnenhintergrund spielbar.

Ein DSA-Abenteuer für 3-6 Helden

Zum Spielen benötigt ihr lediglich das Das Schwarze Auge Regelwerk sowie den Aventurischen Almanach, alle weiteren Informationen zum Erleben der Abenteuer wie Wertekästen, Karten und Pläne sowie Handouts sind im Band enthalten.

boardgame.name: Aventurisches Transmutarium
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb

In the darkened laboratories of Aventurian chimeraologists, research is conducted into the most diverse hybrid beings. Such a workshop, where magic is used to shape bodies and ultimately create life, earns the title of transmutarium among scholars. The Aventurian Transmutarium introduces over 50 chimeras and daimonids - hybrids of the living and demons - that have shaped the history of Aventuria. In addition to game values, illustrations, and numerous ideas for use in adventures, it also includes hints and rules for chimeraologists who wish to venture into recreating these milestones of transmutation research.

A detailed chapter on the history of Aventurian chimaerology introduces local spectral creatures behind which chimeras hide, discusses the magical-theoretical background of the transformation of chimeras into supernatural beings, and explores how artificially created hybrids can even give rise to culture-creating peoples. Within this framework, the art of farm animal chimeraeologists, who can change entire regions with their creations, is also illuminated. Backgrounds on nearly 30 notorious chimaerologists complement the creatures of the main section and provide ample inspiration for creating your own heroes and antagonists.

Since chimaerology is a discipline of infinite possibilities, the Aventurian Transmutarium contains universal rules for creating transmutations of your own design. Both the modification of already known chimeras and the creation of completely new concepts up to reproductive hybrids with magical gifts are possible. With the help of profession packs and a wealth of special skills, a wide variety of chimera masters can be designed, who will soon be researching the secrets of life using the tools that are also included, such as Zurbaran's tincture.


Klappentext

In den verdunkelten Laboren aventurischer Chimärologen wird nach den vielfältigsten Mischwesen geforscht. Eine solche Werkstätte, in der mittels Magie Körper geformt und schließlich Leben erschaffen werden, verdient sich bei Gelehrten den Titel Transmutarium. Das Aventurische Transmutarium stellt über 50 Chimären und Daimonide – Hybride aus Lebenden und Dämonen – vor, welche die Geschichte Aventuriens prägen. Neben Spielwerten, Illustrationen und zahlreichen Ideen für die Verwendung in Abenteuern sind ebenso Hinweise und Regeln für Chimärologinnen enthalten, die sich daran wagen wollen, diese Meilensteine der Transmutationsforschung nachzubilden.

Ein ausführliches Kapitel zur Geschichte der aventurischen Chimärologie stellt lokale Schauergestalten vor, hinter denen sich Chimären verbergen, thematisiert die magietheoretischen Hintergründe der Wandlung von Chimären zu übernatürlichen Wesen und ergründet, wie aus künstlich erschaffenen Hybriden sogar kulturschaffende Völker entstehen können. In diesem Rahmen wird auch die Kunst der Nutztierchimärologen beleuchtet, die mit ihren Kreationen ganze Landstriche verändern können. Hintergründe zu fast 30 berühmtberüchtigten Chimärologen ergänzen die Kreaturen des Hauptteils und bieten reichlich Inspiration für die Gestaltung eigener Helden und Antagonisten.

Da die Chimärologie eine Disziplin unendlicher Möglichkeiten ist, enthält das Aventurische Transmutarium Universalregeln zur Erschaffung von Transmutationen nach eigenem Entwurf. Sowohl die Modifikation bereits bekannter Chimären als auch das Erschaffen völlig neuer Konzepte bis hin zu fortpflanzungsfähigen Hybriden mit magischer Begabung sind hiermit möglich. Mithilfe von Professionspaketen und einer Fülle an Sonderfertigkeiten können unterschiedlichste Chimärenmeister konzipiert werden, welche mit den ebenfalls enthaltenen Hilfsmitteln wie Zurbarans Tinktur bald nach den Geheimnissen des Lebens forschen.

boardgame.name: 24 Days Escape: 3D-Adventskalender – Sherlock Holmes und das Anwesen Moriarty
boardgame.description:
Are you brave enough to embark on a mysterious adventure? Then brace yourself and enter the Moriarty estate. The 24 DAYS ESCAPE Advent Calendar ensures an exciting Advent season not only for Sherlock Holmes fans. This special Advent calendar consists of 24 doors with an exciting story, 24 puzzles and mysterious objects as well as the 3D mansion of Professor Moriarty - arch enemy of Sherlock Holmes - to set up and explore. Solve the puzzles around the mysterious mansion and find all the mysterious items to solve the big master puzzle on December 24th.

- description by the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Misc: Advent / Christmas / Jule calendar game

boardgame.name: Trouble Came to Blackwood
boardgame.description:
From the publishers blurb:

A beast from ages past plagues the village of Blackwood, hunting the population under the light of the full moon. For the last six months, many have tried and failed to stop the monster, but every attempt has met with death. Desperate for salvation, the villagers of Blackwood have concluded that what this beast wants, and the only thing that will save those still alive, is a sacrifice conducted by the beast’s very own worshipers. As luck would have it, the arrival of the PCs has provided a fresh supply of sacrificial lambs.

boardgame.name: Auf der Hut
boardgame.description:
In Auf Der Hut, you want to be on guard to what others are doing so that you spot the right hats on the right people.

To set up, shuffle the character deck and the hat deck separately, then lay out a row of seven face-up characters (princess, jester, knight, witch, etc.) with a face-down hat card above each character. On a turn, take one of three actions:


Peek at a hat card, then put it back.
Swap two hat cards without looking at them.
Reveal a hat card that you think matches the character below it. Is the cowboy hat on the cowboy's head, the Viking helmet on the Viking, or more generally, did you make a match? Great! Take this character and their hat, place them in front of you, then draw a new character from the deck and place a face-down hat card above it. If you revealed one of the four wonder hats, then you've made a match, but you claim only the wonder hat, replacing it with a face-down hat card. If you failed to make a match, you flip the hat card face down again and take a bald head card as a penalty.


When you can't refill a spot in the display, the game ends. For each bald head you have, you must cover a hat on a character you collected — but for each wonder hat you have, you can adorn someone who has been stricken with instantaneous hair loss. Whoever has collected the most hats wins!
